sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-table :data="tableData" border style="width: 100%">
    <el-table-column prop="volunteer" align="center" label="义工" width="180"></el-table-column>
    <el-table-column prop="elder" align="center" label="老人" width="180"></el-table-column>
    <el-table-column prop="volunteer_emotion" align="center" label="义工情绪" width="190"></el-table-column>
    <el-table-column prop="elder_emotion" align="center" label="老人情绪" width="190"></el-table-column>
    <el-table-column prop="image_url" align="center" label="交互截图" width="190"></el-table-column>
    <el-table-column prop="time" align="center" label="时间" width="190"></el-table-column>
  </el-table>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      tableData: []
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.getData();
  },
  methods: {
    getData() {
      this.$axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:5000/readRecord")
          .then(res => {
            this.tableData = res.data.map(record => ({
              ...record,
              volunteer: record.volunteer || '无',
              elder: record.elder || '无',
              volunteer_emotion: record.volunteer_emotion || '无',
              elder_emotion: record.elder_emotion || '无'
            }));
          })
          .catch(error => {
            console.error("Error fetching data: ", error);
            this.$message.error("数据加载失败！");
          });
    }
  }
}
</script>
